description.short: Soon to be software engineer that loves solving problems and finding new solutions. I do web and desktop software development and analysis.
description.long: Soon to be software engineer with varied technical skills in software development and web development. Versatility, autonomy and quick learning are some of my main upsides; I am always up for a new challenge.

projects.name: Ghoster
projects.description: Pay What You Want and Subscription platform for Quebec artists. Allows users to download full album in different format at an optional cost.

projects.name: More Pugs
projects.description: A website dedicated to pugs. Connect to various APIs and show pug related pictures in a neverending list.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: As a fullstack web developer, my tasks were to design various web apps architecture, create APIs to provide data to the frontend, build the web apps interactions with the users and deploy those apps on our Digital Ocean droplets.
experience.technologies: PHP (Laravel & ZF2), Python (Django), Javascript (AngularJS), Gulp & Grunt, Sass

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: As a freelancer in web development, I had to deal directly with the clients to get their real needs. Having those, I was able to build robust web sites and CMS to let the clients update their site.
experience.technologies: Python (Django, Flask), PHP, Javascript (AngularJS, ReactJS), Grunt, Sass

experience.title: Analyst Programmer
experience.description: As an analyst-programmer, my tasks were to analyse and fix different aspects of one of the main application known as Acces. I did lots of bug correction, but also new developments on the application using in-house tools.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
experience.description: As a junior software engineer, I participated in design and implementation of desktop and embedded software.

education.school: École de Technologie Supérieure, Montreal, Quebec, Canada
